snippet.title: Metagal Official  Trailer
snippet.description:
Play as android girl "Meta" whom tries to rescue her creator "Dr.Ray" from an evil dictator called "General Creeper" who has also captured her sister and turned them into Battle Androids in order to use them in his plan for taking over the world. 

Metagal will release on steam with price 3.99$ and if everything gone as plan we should able to release this game in this May -June.

Thank to everyone who support us get greenlit which allow us put the game to the store. 

[Features]
- Classic jump and shoot style platformer. 
- 8 unique levels with environmental design and gimmick. 
- 30 Enemies types not including Boss 
- Defeat Gal No.# Boss and use their weapon. 
- Collect secret items to power up your character. 
- Soft death penalty with "Gear" system allows player to resolve their mistakes with less frustration. 
- Controller and Keyboard customize support.
